name: Security Chief Hannon
descriptions: Security Chief Paul Hannon Sr. is in charge of Vault 101 security in 2277.
He is the father of Paul Hannon Jr. and husband of Vikki Hannon.

He is extremely aggressive and by-the-book, and he wishes his vault security force was a real military with a war to win. He is not nearly as smart as he thinks he is, and his men are not nearly the crack security force he thinks they are. Spit and polish are everything to him; following orders is his highest calling.

topics.response_text: Oh, look. The bad seed is back.{Cold hatred}Play soundFO3 SecurityChiefHannon TheBadSe…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:FO3_SecurityChiefHannon_TheBadSeed.oggnoicon
More kids looking to get us all killed. Now it's up to security to keep them in line.Play soundFO3_HermanGomez_MoreKids.ogghttps://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:FO3_HermanGomez_MoreKids.oggnoicon

After what happened to Vikki and my boy that night, your corpse should be strung up as a warning to anyone else thinks about heading outside.Play soundFo3_PaulHannon_AfterWhatHappened…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Fo3_PaulHannon_AfterWhatHappened.oggnoicon

conversation.response_text: Security check, people. Everything all right?{A little nasty}Play soundFO3 SecurityChiefHannon Security…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:FO3_SecurityChiefHannon_SecurityCheck.oggnoicon

Sir? It's the only world we've ever known. With a regrettable exception, I suppose.{A little uncertain how the Overseer will respond.}Play soundFO3 SecurityChiefHannon TheOnlyW…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:FO3_SecurityChiefHannon_TheOnlyWorld.oggnoicon

We'll have the place back to normal in no time, sir. It'll just take some time to repair the damages he caused.Play soundFO3 SecurityChiefHannon BackToNo…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:FO3_SecurityChiefHannon_BackToNormal.oggnoicon
